text: We get messages all the time from people saying this:
Dear Yes Theory, I live in a small town and there's no
way for me to seek discomfort here... What should I do- and to be honest
it's hard for us to give a universal answer to that
but in a very small town in the countryside of Germany we might have found the perfect
example of a group of young people who defied the odds and created something out of nothing
Meet the Youtube channel, the Real-Life Guys.
They're a group of crazy engineers and inventors from Germany who take forgotten and thrown away
objects such as bathtubs and turn them into flying drones, bicycles,
submarines, and the list goes on.
Now, we're not really experienced builders... but when they asked us:
"Do you guys want to help us turn a bathtub into a snowmobile and ride it down a mountain in the snow?"
We took the first train out of Paris and headed straight to Germany and the Real-Life Guys took control of the rest

- Hi
- How are you man?
- Great, thanks

- Yanis and?
- Phillip

- First time in Germany ever!
- Yeah, really? Wow!
- I think we can all fit the four of us in there?
- Oh my gosh! He actually did it, I was joking about going in the trunk!
- Damn!
- They have a rabbit

- Is it a pet rabbit or is it uh...
- Yeah
- Oh, oh ok
- They're going to eat them for Christmas!

- I mean, I don't know!
- Oh! No it's not...
This was our human drone!

You guys figured out like your own thing that you, that you love that you built together and
you built something out of it which is really cool
Yes

Hey guys, on behalf of the Yes Theory team, we'd like to dedicate this video to Elli
Phillip and Yanis' sister from The Real-Life Guys
A couple of days ago we learned that she unexpectedly passed away
We had the pleasure of meeting Elli when we were out in Germany filming with the guys
and we saw nothing from her but just extreme kindness and love.
We'd like to invite our community to reach out with messages of love and support
to the real-life guys, through their Youtube channel.
So, if you want to do that just go to their most recent video and
comment on it.
Thank you so much.
